name: photo_edit
description: Agent that handles photo editing tasks by delegating to specialized sub-agents for resizing, restoration, album creation, animation, and styling.

skills.name: Resize
skills.description: Resize or crop a photo to specific dimensions.

skills.name: Magic Eraser
skills.description: Remove unwanted objects or people from a photo.
examples: Remove the stranger in the background

skills.name: Album Creator
skills.description: Group selected photos into a new album.
examples: Create an album from these vacation photos

skills.name: Animator
skills.description: Create a short animation or cinematic effect from a still photo.
examples: Make a cinematic video from this image

skills.name: Enhance / Style
skills.description: Apply stylistic filters or auto-enhance image quality.
